Reviews.Content: Very good experieince The hotel has fairly large rooms by Japan standards in this price range. The restaurant has very good western style food. It is about a 10 min walk from Shinagawa station, which can get you direct to many Shinkansen trains. This is the last stop of the Narita Express to the airport, so you can get there direct without switching trains, a big plus to jet lagged westerners. Internet access is good too, Thisis my usual hotel when staing in Tokyo.
Reviews.Author: MValSmth

Reviews.Content: Very good hotel for western couple       View from our 23rd floor window toward the pacific ocean
Reviews.Author: dblatner
